defaultURL.title: Default URL for the Dask Dashboard Webserver

autoStartClient.title: Auto-Start Client
autoStartClient.description: If set to true, every notebook and console will automatically have a dask client for the active cluster injected into the kernel under the name 'client'

hideClusterManager.title: Hide Cluster Manager
hideClusterManager.description: Some deployments don't want to or are unable to use the cluster manager feature. Toggle to hide it from the user interface (note: this does not disable the underlying functionality).
